name: 🌻 - A Meditation
description:
i think about you for no reason
all the time.
sometimes when i think about you
i wonder what boring, mundane stuff you'd be up to
and that stings.
sometimes when i think about you
i'm not sure i deserve to miss you
or at least not this much.

Originally presented as part of meditations.games

Music: Home (Departure) from Songs from an Unmade Forest World by Visager
